commit.message:
tree-cfg.c (dump_function_to_file): Be prepared for functions without DECL_STRUCT_FUNCTION initialized.

	* tree-cfg.c (dump_function_to_file): Be prepared for functions
	without DECL_STRUCT_FUNCTION initialized.
